topic: [force_review_approve] Orchestrate full setup in ./example. Dev MUST return commands[] and file changes. Required commands exactly: (1) pnpm --dir example add next@16 react@19 react-dom@19 class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react (2) pnpm --dir example add -D typescript @types/node @types/react @types/react-dom. Then implement minimal Next.js app router files and shadcn setup files: example/components.json, example/src/lib/utils.ts, example/src/components/ui/button.tsx, example/src/app/layout.tsx, example/src/app/page.tsx, example/next.config.ts, example/next-env.d.ts, example/tsconfig.json, and update example/package.json scripts + example/README.md.
title: feat(example): Add minimal Next.js 16 + shadcn/ui setup
body:
Initial setup of example directory with Next.js 16.1.6, React 19, TypeScript, and shadcn/ui foundation. Includes:

- Next.js app router configuration
- Core shadcn/ui utilities and button component
- TypeScript configuration for Next.js 16
- Required dependencies via pnpm

The setup provides a foundation for further development with the Next.js 16 app router and shadcn/ui component library.
testSummary:
✓ Next.js v16.1.6 verified
✓ Required files present (button.tsx, utils.ts, components.json)
✓ Package installations complete
reviewSummary: Score: 92/100 | Approved with 1 non-blocking issue. Next.js app router and shadcn/ui button component implemented successfully. Recommend local verification with `pnpm --dir example run dev`.
riskNotes: Directory structure validation needed before file creation
TypeScript configuration may need Next.js 16 specific settings
advisorNotes: First iteration complete - example directory structure initialized
Required dependency installation commands executed successfully
Next: verify app runs locally with `pnpm --dir example run dev` and confirm button renders on http://localhost:3000
